problem_names:
lemma NS_no_Notes:
 "evs \<in> ns_public \<Longrightarrow> Notes A X \<notin> set evs"
translations:
lemma NS_no_Notes:
 "evs \<in> ns_public \<Longrightarrow> Notes A X \<notin> set evs"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. evs \<in> ns_public \<Longrightarrow> Notes A X \<notin> set evs

proof (prove)
goal (6 subgoals):
 1. Notes A X \<notin> set []
 2. \<And>evsf Xa Aa B.
       \<lbrakk>evsf \<in> ns_public; Notes A X \<notin> set evsf;
        Xa \<in> synth (analz (knows Aa evsf))\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> Notes A X \<notin> set (Says Aa B Xa # evsf)
 3. \<And>evsr Aa B Xa.
       \<lbrakk>evsr \<in> ns_public; Notes A X \<notin> set evsr;
        Says Aa B Xa \<in> set evsr\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> Notes A X \<notin> set (Gets B Xa # evsr)
 4. \<And>evs1 NA Aa B.
       \<lbrakk>evs1 \<in> ns_public; Notes A X \<notin> set evs1;
        Nonce NA \<notin> used evs1\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> Notes A X
                         \<notin> set (Says Aa B
  (Crypt (pubK B) \<lbrace>Nonce NA, Agent Aa\<rbrace>) #
 evs1)
 5. \<And>evs2 NB B NA Aa.
       \<lbrakk>evs2 \<in> ns_public; Notes A X \<notin> set evs2;
        Nonce NB \<notin> used evs2;
        Gets B (Crypt (pubK B) \<lbrace>Nonce NA, Agent Aa\<rbrace>)
        \<in> set evs2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> Notes A X
                         \<notin> set (Says B Aa
  (Crypt (pubK Aa) \<lbrace>Nonce NA, Nonce NB\<rbrace>) #
 evs2)
 6. \<And>evs3 Aa B NA NB.
       \<lbrakk>evs3 \<in> ns_public; Notes A X \<notin> set evs3;
        Says Aa B (Crypt (pubK B) \<lbrace>Nonce NA, Agent Aa\<rbrace>)
        \<in> set evs3;
        Gets Aa (Crypt (pubK Aa) \<lbrace>Nonce NA, Nonce NB\<rbrace>)
        \<in> set evs3\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> Notes A X
                         \<notin> set (Says Aa B
  (Crypt (pubK B) (Nonce NB)) #
 evs3)
text\<open>Confidentiality treatment in separate theory file\<close>
